item.title: Python for Everybody Specialization
item.description: I’m starting off the new year by learning something new. I am a big fan of non-traditional education, and Coursera is a platform I’ve used a few times before. You may not get courses that qualify as university credit, but I’ve found it to be a useful resource for learning. I might be biased (my university degree is in Economics, which I’ve never used), but in some ways, I actually prefer a MOOC (that’s a Massively Open Online Course) to a typical formal university course for a few reasons:
